title: SixGod6
author: SixGod6
created_time: May 17, 2023, 06:45:10 AMLast edit: May 18, 2023, 07:06:36 AM by SixGod6
content: What happened:: Stake scammed me for 0.14892000 BTCHey everyone,Long term customer on stake (3 years).I have lost about 2 million USD on their platform during this time- I have encountered many issues with the sports provider scamming not only myself but other players as well.Typically, stake support was good at resolving these issues but lately? Not a chance. This is mainly due to the fact that the sports team and all of support dislike me personally and are all racist towards me.sport:81744842I placed this bet and immediately after placing the bet, I turned on the live video for the game and noticed the score was wrong.I contacted support IMMEDIATELY and they ignored me for about 5 hours- by that point, not only did the match with the wrong score and wrong odds lose but so did another one of my matches.This is a strategy by stake so that they can respond and say “well your other selections lost anyways” simply a scam method on their end that may work with an amateur.Issue with the multi was the e sports matchMinnesota Timberwolves (Hunarik) vs Phoenix Suns (Shag)The score and odds were wrong on 5 different occasions.Stake refuses to do anything. I have filed a complaint with multiple third party agencies that deal with complaints and also have contacted curaçao gaming.I should also mention that I am a diamond player.Stay away from these trash cans. In addition to being scammers, they have lowered all bonuses ten fold.Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2072589.100Amount Scammed: 0.14892000 BTC / 4020 USDPayment Method: BitcoinsProof of wrong score https://ibb.co/fDWmDXVhttps://ibb.co/1ZWnj9Ghttps://ibb.co/TRx4wCFhttps://ibb.co/njwwtY2Match can be viewed here https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=wQ00y1iMidc&feature=youtu.be@Micro @StunnaIf you guys don’t refund me within 24 hours, I will be taking this to the next level.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Nobody here is going to watch 3 and half hours of a video just to prove whether you are wrong or right. Maybe you could just post snippets of the video that can help your case.Quote from: SixGod6 on May 17, 2023, 06:45:10 AMScammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2072589.100Reference Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=260070.0You might want to post the right links… What does escrow.ms have to do with stake.com?

comments.author: SixGod6
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on May 17, 2023, 08:14:08 PMNobody here is going to watch 3 and half hours of a video just to prove whether you are wrong or right. Maybe you could just post snippets of the video that can help your case.Quote from: SixGod6 on May 17, 2023, 06:45:10 AMScammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2072589.100Reference Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=260070.0You might want to post the right links… What does escrow.ms have to do with stake.com?Hey Jerome,Sorry about that link it was an accident I forgot to remove it when I used the template for the scam accusation.I don’t expect anyone to watch the video, I posted the photos above with the wrong score. Feel free to take a look.

comments.author: Kingrojie
comments.body: I'm not surprised at all whatsoever

comments.author: SixGod6
comments.body: Quote from: Kingrojie on May 18, 2023, 09:09:24 AMI'm not surprised at all whatsoeverThey are simply scumbags.I hope Eddie ends up like tony from 5dimes one day and I’m sure he will.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I confess that I don't understand what you wanted stake.com to do, but for us to understand better why don't you post the conversation you had with stake.com support so we can see what you wanted them to do and what the support from stake.com told you, I believe that with this we will understand what is happening and what parts are wrong and right. so it's weird that you went to the Scam Report Format thread and forgot to put PM/Chat Logs in your thread, anyway since you didn't put it in this thread you might want to put it so that we have a chance to see the history of both partsyou also made a post on the stake.com ANN thread where you already made threats to expose Eddie's physical residence and your plan Is to publish his address, you also keep calling the casino scumbags so I wonder what you hope to get out of them when you create a thread here in this section and you are not calm and do not seem to be someone patient and peaceful, you have already resorted to verbal violence, I can only advise you to look for a lawyer and he will instruct you better in what steps you should proceed , although I still doubt that stake.com is to blame for your loss but seek help from lawyer or an external mediator like askgambler, in case you are looking for askgambler, here is the link:https://www.askgamblers.com/pt/casino-complaintsI hope you don't make threats to stake.com when you submit your complaint, because even the mediator won't look at you well, and that won't help your case at all
